item.title: CVE-2024-43997|2024-10-17T18:34:20.317Z -- easy.jobs -- easyjobs
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in easy.Jobs EasyJobs allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects EasyJobs: from n/a through 2.4.14.
